FuncDef: This command configures a local route tag that can be used on export policies to match MAC/IP routes generated by the proxy-ARP or proxy-ND module. For example, if a new active dynamic proxy-ARP entry is added to the proxy-ARP table andevpn-route-tagis 10, an export policy that matches on tag 10 and adds a site-of-origin community SOO-1, allows the router to advertise the MAC/IP route for the proxy-ARP entry with community SOO-1.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the route tag, in either decimal or hexadecimal form. Values-1 to 255.
